title: Her Four Cowboys
description: This cowgirl knows how to ride.All night long.My tomboy best friend is all grown up.One mistletoe kiss is all it takes.Electric and steamy.I want to break all the rules.So do my three brothers.The Kent brothers learned a long time ago:Don’t fight with your brother. Just share.We wouldn’t mind sharing,To get Lucy all to ourselves.She can still be a good girl,Even if she’s a little bit bad with us.Now we just have to make her our lady.
author: Natasha L. Black
